c74object.name: sp.gridscale
c74object.digest: Scale and offset XY grid-based list
c74object.description: Scale and offset XY grid-based list.
c74object.discussion: Open the Overview Patch The sp.gridscale object allows you to scale and offset an XY grid-based space. This is useful when paired with sp.gridmatch allowing you to use the full range of your controller to access and control a subspace within the overall space.

method.name: clear
method.digest: Clears any scaling and resets to default values
method.description: Clears any scaling and resets to default values (0. 1. 0. 1.).

method.name: node
method.digest: Keyword identifier for control messages coming from nodes
method.description: Keyword identifier for control messages coming from nodes. This takes the control messages from the 2nd outlet of nodes.

attribute.name: xy
attribute.digest: Four item list consisting of output scaling
attribute.description: Four item list consisting of {x low, x high, y low, y high} output scaling.
